reviewText: Purchased more out of nostalgia and curiosity, because of its classic status, but either I am getting too old for this sort of stuff, or my memory had held more promise than the re-watching delivered.  Still bemused by the fact that the star of the show was an innocent looking model for Ivory Soap products.  Needless to say, that relationship didn't last.
summary: A  po rno classic that unfortunately shows its age
Title: Behind The Green Door (VHS)

reviewText: For me, this is on a par with ...Misty Beethoven and The Devil in Miss Jones. The premise is one of abduction (no violence) and being seduced, being prepared for and finally, 'being taken' in two basic scenes. The voyeurs who attend the private club, witness the events and as they do so, explore themselves and others to varying degrees of intensity and indeed, penetration. It's fun as well as being explicit and erotic. (P.S. ...Misty Beethoven and ...Miss Jones are currently unavailable for review).Ian Hunter.Author of `e-Love'.
Title: Behind The Green Door (VHS)

reviewText: I don't usually buy porn movies but Behind the Green Door is listed in Danny Pearys cult film book. Green Door is in other cult film books too so that is reason enough for me to watch it.
Title: Behind The Green Door (VHS)

reviewText: Borrow, but don't buy this film. It has it moments but that's it. There are much better adult movies out there.

Title: Behind The Green Door (VHS)

reviewText: This is another sociological study (yea bulls**t).What if you, sitting in a public place were suddenly abducted, blindfolded and taken to a mysterious place; upon entering which you are tied, undressed, and lustfully attacked with the tongues, fingers and hands of a bunch of strangers? All this while being anxiously watched by a crowd of perverts.And what of the crowd of perverts? What do you suppose they would do? Or what would you do if you were one of the perverts in the audience beholding the spectacle?This is a pretty realistic appraisal of one of the countless unexpected twists that may have happened to anybody. How aweful.As a study only. Not intended for participation. (Huh?)How cum Amazon doesn't have it on DVD? It's ok, you probably shouldn't watch it anyway. I do have the DVD however.
summary: Who could have dreamed this one up?
Title: Behind The Green Door (VHS)

reviewerName: The Movie Guy "Movies from A to Z"
reviewText: This is a classic adult film which is more famous for what it did, than the content of the film. By porn standards, this is a so-so film with the climax being a scene with Marilyn taking on 5 guys. Marilyn, in case you lived under a rock, was the pure Ivory Snow cover girl. She lost that gig when she did this film and they changed the box. The Mitchel brothers convince Marilyn by doing porn, that this would be a pathway to doing real acting, something she always wanted to do.During the shooting there was an attempt to have all five men climax at the same time. This was never accomplished after many takes, so they opted to let the magic of editing do it for them.This is the film that legalized the adult film industry. When this film was made, elements of organized crime pirated the film from the Mitchel brothers. In order to prosecute organize crime, the government had to legitimize the film as having standing under copyright protection, thus placing it between the proverbial rock and the hard place. This opened the door for neighborhood theaters and drive-ins to show adult films which took off astronomically until the invention of the VHS/Beta-max tape.
Title: Behind The Green Door (VHS)
